about_the_game:
In the second installment of the Stories of Submission anthology we open on William who expects more from his new life after a year of being Mistress Freyja's servant. Freyja tells him the story of Alex and Stacy to remind him that being needy and demanding makes for a bad sub.

Alex is the spoiled man-child of rich parents who has never made anything of himself. Cripplingly self-aware, he can't maintain friendships or relationships and goes from one woman to the next. That all changes when he starts dating Stacy. For once, a woman sees past his pickup persona and doesn't leave him immediately. What Alex doesn't realize is that Stacy has a hidden side as well and she's about to teach him a harsh lesson.

Features:

■ A fascinating story about NTR/cuckoldry and the kind of pathetic men who crave it.

■ Numerous sex scenes where the main character gets only to watch or listen.

■ Several Endings. Which one's the 'good' ending is up to you.

content_descriptors.notes: Warning: This game contains femdom elements, which includes topics like: humiliation, forced orgasms, cuckolding, spanking, etc.
